nodes.text: The Skyflipper was a small transport craft that was produced by the Sandtek Corporation, based on Naboo. It was designed to carry a pilot and one passenger across short distances.

Ric Olié once flew a Skyflipper during his youth, and crashed with it. He was not discouraged by a near-fatal incident—which would be normal for most pilot novices—but instead built a new Skyflipper and continued his career. This accident contributed to other pilots nicknaming him "Reckless Ric."
